Projects Page

All of my projects! (Besides this website of course.)

Countdown to Chaos

An escape room for a gamejam theme of "Time is Running Out".

TreeID

An app that helps users identify trees in Yosemite National Park.

JetStream

An app to help users plan out their entire business trip from how to get there, to booking flights and hotels!

Parking++

My first hackathon! A webapp to find parking spots in real-time using Inrix's API.
